Class OrdersService

    • placeOrder

      @Transactional(rollbackFor=DaoException.class) public OrderDetails placeOrder(OrderDto order, String username)
      Transactional sets up a SQL TRANSACTION and rolls back if any DaoException occurs.
      Parameters:
      order - order data to add
      username - username of client making the request
      Returns:
      Order details
